name: Sound of the Birth of the Metaverse  Prod. By André Elias
description:
Sound of the Birth of the Metaverse  Prod. By André Elias

Produced by: André Elias
Song title: "Sound of the Birth of the Metaverse"

A live analog synth interpretation of the Sound of the Birth of the Metaverse that we are now creating in. 

It is also the sound of the beginning of my NFT journey.

C Minor 120 Bpm

LIVE Synth Performance by André Elias. No Edits. 

Mixed and Master in Ableton by André Elias. 

SYNTHS USED:

MOOG SUBSEQUENT 37: BASS, LEAD 

KORG MINILOGUE XD: ARP through Monologue XD Effects

PROPHET REV 2: LEAD AND PAD

Cover made on FlipaClip for iPad by André Elias


Purchasing a copy of "Sound of the Birth of the Metaverse" gives you the rights to use the song in your personal and/or commercial projects.

Please copy and paste this in the description and/or credit section of your project:
————————————

Music Produced by André Elias @_andrelias
Song: "Sound of the Birth of the Metaverse"

————————————
HAVING THIS NFT IN YOUR WALLET WILL ALLOW YOU TO:
- Use the song in your NFTs
- Edit/Make minor adjustments to the song as needed to fit your project
- Use sections of the song in your own projects
- Use the song in your Movies and/or TV Series and/or YouTube videos and/or Promotional Videos and/or Social Media Posts
- Use for remixes.

Please DO NOT resell the song on any other platform aside from hicetnunc.xyz, objkt.com and/or henext.xyz.

If you resell/burn all copies of the song that you previously owned on secondary, you give up all the rights you previously owned to the song and any project that you used the song on MUST be taken down.

Please DO NOT put your tag on the song and sell it like you made the song.

If you can, show me what you do with the song so I can share and see where the “Sound of the Metaverse” has headed

Please contact me via email or twitter if you have any questions 

Email: andre.elias90@gmail.com
